name: Almia Moonwhisper
rules: FRONT: 5 -> Flip Almia;BACK: At the start of your turn, if you control an [Arcane] ally, you may draw a card.
flavour: In this time of chaos and turmoil, it may fall to those of us who can manipulate the acrane to rein in the fury of the elements.

name: Aric Stonejack
rules: FRONT: 7 -> Flip Aric;BACK: At the end of your turn, if you do not control a Ghoul, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.
flavour: The future of Ironforge lies in the hands of the Council, but we must deal with the elemental lords before that future can come to pass, lad.

name: Edwin Blademark
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Edwin;BACK: Allies you control have Stealth. (They can't be protected against.)
flavour: The elements are strong, but let them spend their energy wastefully, and they will crumble and fall.

name: Grayson Steelworth
rules: FRONT: 3 -> Flip Grayson;BACK: Dual Wield (You can control a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. You can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)
flavour: My blades will not rest until the elements know them by name and cower in fear before me.

name: Gundek Hammerguard
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Gundek;BACK: Protector(Gundek may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: Now that Dark Iron dwarves have returned to Ironforge, we can make use of their knowledge of the Firelord.

name: Huntsman Gorwal
rules: FRONT: 5 -> Flip Gorwal;BACK: Pets you control have Ferocity. (They can attack immediately.)
flavour: The Twilight's Hammer bends the elements to their will, and we must help put an end to this corruption.

name: Merissa Firebrew
rules: FRONT: 3 -> Flip Merissa;BACK: When you play an equipment, Merissa has Assault 1 this turn.
flavour: We must find a way to calm the warring elements, or Azeroth will be torn apart from its very core.

name: Olivia Demascas
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Olivia;BACK: When a hero or ally you control deals shadow ([Shadow]) damage to an opposing hero, you may put the top two cards of that hero's controller's deck into his graveyard.
flavour: The Firelord and the Windlord have aligned themselves with Deathwing; we have no choice but to show them the error of their ways.

name: Thira Anvilash
rules: FRONT: 3 -> Flip Thira;BACK: When you attach an ability to an opposing hero or ally, Thira deals 1 shadow damage to that character and heals 1 damage from herself.
flavour: There are those who wish to calm the elements as peacefully as possible, but I am more than willing to do so with violence and pain.

name: Vanira Raventhorne
rules: FRONT: 5 -> Flip Vanira;BACK: Vanira has Assault 2 while you control a Form. (She has +2 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: We must aid Ysera at the World Tree, or the shrines of the ancients will be lost forever.

name: Baxxel Geartooth
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Baxxel;BACK: Pets you control have Assault 2. (They have +2 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: I was surprised to see Gallywix bring us into the Horde, but so far, this deal has been quite favorable.

name: Fraznak the Furious
rules: FRONT: 5 -> Flip Fraznak;BACK: Allies you control have Assault 1. (They have +1 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: The raging elements? Don't make me laugh.

name: Jinxy Blastwheel
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Jinxy;BACK: At the start of your turn, Jinxy deals 1 arcane damage to target hero for each [Arcane] ally you control.
flavour: Following the lead of Warchief Hellscream is very different than following Gallywix, but perhaps in this time of chaos, we need such leadership.

name: Kanga the Primal
rules: FRONT: 3 -> Flip Kanga;BACK: You pay 1 less to play Feral abilities, to a minimum of 1.
flavour: Ysera... Malfurion... Cenarius... I hope dat dere assistance is enough to calm da raging elements.

name: Mindtwister Quimtrix
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Quimtrix;BACK: When an ally you control is destroyed, Quimtrix may deal 1 shadow damage to target ally.
flavour: Do the elements dare enter the shadows and see what lies in the unknown?

name: Sunwalker Nahano
rules: FRONT: 3 -> Flip Nahano;BACK: Allies you control with Protector have +1 ATK while defending.
flavour: The light of the sun will surely help guide us, even in the deepest depths of the earth and sea.

name: Tazrik Crankrust
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Tazrik;BACK: Tazrik has Assault 1 for each Elemental ally you control.
flavour: Never in all my days did I think that I would ever get to witness the elemental lords in all their power and might.

name: Uzak'zim
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Uzak'zim;BACK: At the start of your turn, Uzak'zim deals 1 shadow damage to each opposing hero and ally that has an attachment you control.
flavour: Earth, fire, air, water - what hope do dey have when dey stand against da demonic fel magic?

name: Zimzi the Trickster
rules: FRONT: 2 -> Flip Zimzi;BACK: Zimzi and allies you control with Stealth also have Assault 1.
flavour: Are Ragnaros and Al'Akir prepared to defend themselves on all fronts? I have yet to be impressed.

name: Zin'sul
rules: FRONT: 2 -> Flip Zim'sul;BACK: You pay 1 less to strike with weapons.
flavour: I wondered why da gods let me return in undeath, mon, but now I see my purpose and what I must do to help save dis world.

name: Kalecgos
rules: You pay 3 less to play Kalecgos for each ability you played this turn.;When you play a non-Ongoing ability, copy it. (You may choose new targets for the copy.)
flavour: The return of Deathwing has put the future of my flight in jeopardy.

name: Nozdormu the Timeless
rules: You may pay up to X less to play Nozdormu, where X is the combined cost of cards you control.;When your hero becomes Nozdormu, if you control no ready resources, target player skips his next turn.
flavour: Even Deathwing will pass into time... even he will eventually be part... of my collection...

name: Blight Bringers
rules: Up to thee target allies have -3 ATK this turn.
flavour: Beware their claws - even the slightest touch can be debilitating! - Vanira Raventhorne

name: Command of Undeath
rules: Put target opposing equipment on the bottom of its owner's deck. If you do, your hero deals 4 shadow damage to its controller's hero.

name: Death Strike
rules: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target ally, plus an additional 2 if you control a weapon, plus an additional 2 if you control a Disease. Then, your hero heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt this way.

name: Frozen Blight
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached hero. The controller of a hero dealt damage this way can't play abilities this turn.
flavour: The chill of death will suffocate even the most vibrant flame. - Aric Stonejack

name: Gargoyle
rules: Unholy Talent (You can't put Blood Talents or Frost Talents in your deck.);Ferocity;At the end of your turn, if this ally is undamaged, put him into his owner's hand.

name: Horn of Winter
rules: Heroes and allies you control have Assault 1 this turn. They have +1 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: The last sound you'll hear before death grips your soul. - Ayaka Winterhoof

name: Outbreak
rules: Opposing allies have -X / -X this turn, where X is the cost of a Disease you control.
flavour: The spread of flames may be quick and destructive, but the spread of disease is a sign of real power. - Aric Stonejack

name: Sanguine Presence
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Protector and +10 [Health].;1, [Exhaust] -> Ready your hero.
flavour: Da elements will fear da face of death, just as all else do. - Zin'sil

name: Brutal Bear Form
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Protector. (It may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);Allies you control have Assault 1. They have +1 ATK on your turn.)

name: Celestial Moonfire
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 2 arcane damage to it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if this ability is in play, your hero deals 2 arcane damage to attached character.;On your turn: Exhaust an [Arcane] ally you control -> Put this ability into its owner's hand.

name: Healing Touch
rules: Your hero heals 10 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: In time, nature will heal all wounds. - Arturius Hathrow

name: Maim
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally. If you control a Form, your hero deals 3 melee damage to that character.

name: Moonshard
rules: Your hero deals 4 arcane damage to target ally.
flavour: That which once been peaceful is now a force to be reckoned with, mon. - Kanga the Primal

name: Rend and Tear
rules: Feral Talent (You can't put Balance Talents or Restoration Talents in your deck.);Ongoing: When this ability enters play, your hero deals 1 melee damage to each of up to three target opposing heroes and/or allies.;Your hero has Assault 2 for each damaged opposing character.;(received errata)

name: Savage Cat Form
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Assault 1 and Stealth.;(It has +1 ATK on your turn and can't be protected against.)
flavour: The desecration of the shrines of the ancients shall not go unpunished. - Arturius Hathrow

name: Starburst
rules: Your hero deals 3 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Then, you may put this ability into your resource row face down and exhausted.
flavour: May Elune guide us in this time of chaos. - Vanira Raventhorne

name: Arcane Shot
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010,Champion Decks
flavour: I can't miss! - Baxxel Geartooth

name: Cobra Shot
rules: Your hero deals nature damage to target hero or ally equal to the combined ATK of a Pet and a Ranged weapon you control.
flavour: As if one or the other wasn't enough by itself. - Almia Moonwhisper

name: Donatello
rules: Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: He's my real hero in half-shell. - Grumpherys

name: Loque
rules: Beast Mastery Talent (You can't put Marksmanship Talents or Survival Talents in your deck.);Elusive, Stealth, Untargetable;Damage that this ally would deal is unpreventable.

name: Noxious Trap
rules: Trap You may exhaust your defending hero instead of paying this ability's cost;Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target attacker. Then, if that attacker has fatal damage, you may ready up to three resources you control.

name: Warning Shot
rules: Target ally with cost 4 or more has -5 ATK this turn.
flavour: Next time, I'll be aiming at your head! - Huntsman Gorwal

name: Widow Venom
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: Attached character can't be healed.;At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 nature damage to attached character.
flavour: So, can you guess how it got the name? - Huntsman Gorwal

name: Wild Fervor
rules: Target ally has Assault 2, Ferocity, and Long-Range this turn.
flavour: Sometimes there is no margin for error.

name: Arcane Barrage
rules: Arcane Talent (You can't put Fire Talents or Frost Talents in your deck.);This ability can't be interrupted.;Your hero deals 4 arcane damage to target hero or ally.;You may play this ability from your graveyard. If you do, the next time it would enter a graveyard from anywhere, remove it from the game instead.
flavour: We must end this elemental threat, one way or another. - Jinxy Blastwheel

name: Arcane Foresight
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally, or 3 if you played another ability this turn.
flavour: One moment of hesitation, and you may find yourself at a diasadvantage. - Suvok Frozeeye

name: Arcane Inferno
rules: Ongoing: Exhaust an [Arcane] ally you control -> You pay 1 less to play your next ability this turn, to a minimum of 1.;Exhaust a [Fire] ally you control -> The next time your hero would deal damage with an ability this turn, it deals that much +1 instead.

name: Arcane Missiles
rules: Your hero deals X arcane damage to target hero or ally. X can't be more than 5.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Use the right tool for the job. - Jinxy Blastwheel

name: Draconic Flames
rules: Target a hero or ally, and you may target an additional character for each Dragonkin you control. Your hero deals 5 fire damage to each target.
flavour: I have studied the Dragonkin for so long now that I know their very essence. - Almia Moonwhisper

name: Flash Freeze
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack or exhaust.

name: Mystical Refreshment
rules: Draw a card for each [Arcane] ally you control.
flavour: Rest while you can. - Almia Moonwhisper

name: Tidal Elemental
rules: Elusive(This ally can't be attacked.);2, [Exhaust] -> Exhaust target ally.
flavour: Water is the perfect element. It can be calm like a river or rage like a tsunami. - Kadus Frosthand

name: Blessing of Faith
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 / +1.;2, Destroy this ability -> Destroy target ability.
flavour: Trust in the Light to cure all ills. - Gundek Hammerguard

name: Flash of Light
rules: Your hero heals all damage from target ally.;Draw a card.
flavour: May your pain be only temporary. - Sunwalker Nahano

name: Holy Vengeance
rules: Ongoing: When an ally you control is destroyed, you may pay 1. If you do, your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target hero.
flavour: Sooner or later, all must stand in judgment before the Light. - Gundek Hammerguard

name: Holy Wrath
rules: Your hero deals 4 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally, plus an additional 4 if that character is a Demon, Dragonkin, or Elemental.

name: Inquisition
rules: Target ally deals unpreventable holy damage to itself equal to its ATK.
flavour: Run all you like. Justice will eventually find you. - Sunwalker Nahano

name: Light of Reckoning
rules: Your hero has +3 ATK while defending this combat.
flavour: Even the intense flames of the Firelord are but a flicker when compared to the power of the Light. - Gundek Hammerguard

name: Shield of the Righteous
rules: Protection Talent (You can't put Holy Talents or Retribution Talents in your deck.);Your hero deals X unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally and has Assault X this turn, where X is the DEF of a Shield you control.

name: Vengeful Crusader Strike
rules: Your hero deals 4 melee damage to target attacker.
flavour: My blade is guided by the Light. Your hostility has not gone unnoticed. - Sunwalker Nahano

name: Dark Embrace
rules: Each player puts the top 5 cards of his deck into his graveyard.
flavour: The shadows will devour every last bit of Al'Akir and his servants. - Olivia Demascas

name: Expel
rules: Your hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to target ally for each ally you control.

name: Focused Dispel
rules: Destroy up to two target abilities.
flavour: We must rid all Azeroth of the influence of the Old Gods. - Mindtwister Quimtrix

name: Hymn of Hope
rules: Your hero heals 3 damage from each friendly hero and ally. For each character healed this way, ready a resource you control.
flavour: The Light shall renew both body and spirit. - Yuna Sunridge

name: Leap of Faith
rules: Remove target ability, ally, or equipment you own from the game. Then, put it into play under your control. (It enters play ready and undamaged.)
flavour: Get out of the fire! - Mindtwister Quimtrix

name: Mind Melt
rules: Shadow Talent (You can't put Discipline Talents or Holy Talents in your deck.);Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally. That character's controller discards a card for each damage dealt this way.
flavour: When I'm finished with you, you won't even remeber your name. - Olivia Demascas

name: Power Word: Endurance
rules: Ongoing: Friendly heroes and allies have +2 [Health].
flavour: The world lies broken, but we must do all that we can to endure. - Tilly Fiddlelight

name: Shadow Word: Death
rules: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally. Then, if that character doesn't have fatal damage, put 3 damage on your hero.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive
flavour: Ragnaros and his minions will be suffocated by the enveloping shadows. - Olivia Demascas

name: Agonizing Poison
rules: Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 3 nature damage to attached character if its controller has four or fewer cards in his hand.

name: Coated Blades
rules: Choose one: Target player discards a card for each Poison attached to his hero; or search your deck for a Poison, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
flavour: Take every advantage that you can get. - Caleb Pavish

name: Infiltrate
rules: Up to two target heroes and/or allies have Assault 2 and Stealth this turn. (They have +2 ATK on your turn and can't be protected against.)
flavour: Stick to the shadows. You'll live a lot longer that way. - Zimzi the Trickster

name: Invigorate
rules: As an additional cost to play, remove up to five [Rogue] abilities in your graveyard from the game.;Ready X resources you control, and you may ready target ally with cost X or less, where X is the number of cards removed this way.

name: Sap
rules: Attach to target hero or ally and exhaust it.;Ongoing: Attached character can't ready during its controller's ready step.;When attached character is dealt damage, destroy this ability.

name: Shadow Dance
rules: Subtlety Talent (You can't put Assassination Talents or Combat Talents in your deck.);Your hero has Assault 2 and Stealth this turn.;Ongoing: When you play a [Rogue] ability, your hero has Assault 2 and Stealth this turn.

name: Tormenting Gouge
rules: Exhaust each opposing ally with cost 4 or less.
flavour: We must keep the Windlord and his elementals spread thin if we are to succeed. - Edwin Blademark

name: Trickster's Gambit
rules: The next time damage would be dealt to your hero this turn, it's dealt to another target hero or ally instead.
flavour: You must be ready to change your focus at a moment's notice. - Zimzi the Trickster

name: Ancestral Recovery
rules: Put up to two target allies from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: Rise and be renewed, brothers and sisters! - Bragvi Stormstein

name: Blazing Elemental Totem
rules: When this card enters play, put two [Fire] / 1 [Health] Fire Elemental ally tokens into play.;Ongoing: [Fire] allies you control have Ferocity. (They may attack immediately.);(Totems can't attack.)

name: Chain Heal
rules: Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Your hero heals 3, 2, and 1 damage from them, respectively.
reprinted: Fires of Outland,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Dis voodoo be good for joo, mon. - Toz'jun

name: Elemental Flames
rules: Your hero deals 3 fire damage to target ally. If you control an Elemental ally, your hero also deals 3 fire damage to that ally's controller's hero.
flavour: We must follow the advice if the Earthen Ring, for they are truly attuned to the working of the elements. - Tazrik Crankrust

name: Primal Dexterity
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Dual Wield.;When you play or strike with a weapon, you may pay 1. If you do, your hero deals 2 nature damage to target hero or ally.

name: Tempest Totem
rules: Ongoing: When this card enters play, you may put target Totem from your graveyard Into your hand.;You pay 1 less to play Totems, to a minimum of 1.;(Totems can't attack.)

name: Totemic Vigor
rules: Enhancement Talent (You can't put Elemental Talents or Restoration Talents in your deck.);Ongoing: Totems you control have +2 [Health].;Your hero has Assault 1 for each Totem you control.

name: Unleash Elements
rules: Put a copy of each token ally you control into play.
flavour: The elements struggle to be free. Who am I to deny them? - Merissa Firebrew

name: Dread Touch
rules: Put target opposing ally into its owner's hand. Then, that player discard a card.
flavour: I have seen da voodoo and da mojo, mon, and now it's time to show what da Nether can do. - Uzak'zim

name: Everlasting Affliction
rules: Affliction Talent (You can't put Demonology Talents or Destruction Talents in your deck.);Attach to target opposing hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero.;If damage is dealt this way, you may search your deck for a card named Everlasting Affliction and attach it to attached hero.

name: Fel Covenant
rules: Remove target ally from the game. If you do, your hero deals fire damage to itself equal to that ally's cost.
flavour: I will suffer your presence no longer. - Thira Anvilash

name: Fel Flame
rules: Ongoing: When this ability enters play, your Hero deals 2 unpreventable shadowfire damage to target hero or ally.;2 -> [Shadow] and [Fire] cards you control have +1 ATK this turn.

name: Grimdron
rules: Elusive(This ally can't be attacked.);1, [Exhaust] -> This ally deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Ohhhh, sure, send the little guy!

name: Grim Harvest
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may destroy an ally you control. If you do, your hero deals shadow damage to target hero or ally equal to the destroyed ally's cost and heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt this way.

name: Maazhum
rules: When this ally enters play, he deals 3 shadow damage to target hero and heals 3 damage from your hero.

name: Seed of Corruption
rules: Attach to target opposing ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you hero deals 2 shadow damage to attached ally.;When attached ally is destroyed, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally.

name: Burning Rage
rules: Ongoing: While you control no ready resources, allies you control have +2 ATK.
flavour: There is a warrior in the heart of all of us, yearning to be unleashed. - Grayson Steelworth

name: Dauntless Defender
rules: Target ally has Protector this turn. It also has +4 ATK while defending this turn. (It has exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);(received errata)

name: Enraged Regeneration
rules: Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon while attacking, it heals 3 damage from itself.
flavour: Nobody makes me bleed my own blood! - Jai Dawnsteel

name: Intercept
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally, and your hero deals 1 melee damage to it.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Knock 'em down, then finish 'em off. - Fraznak the Furious

name: Merciless Strikes
rules: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to each damaged opposing hero or ally.
flavour: You'd best give up now, before I am forced to spill more of your blood. - Grayson Steelworth

name: Peerless Guard
rules: The next time combat damage would be dealt to target defending ally you control this turn, it's dealt to your hero instead.

name: Shattering Throw
rules: Ongoing: When this ability enters play, you may destroy target equipment.;[Exhaust] -> Target weapon you control has Thrown this turn. (When you strike with that weapon, it has Long-Range this combat. At the end of this turn, put that weapon into its owner's hand.)

name: Intensify
rules: The next time target friendly hero or ally would deal any type of damage this turn, it deals double that much fire damage instead.
flavour: The flames that I conjure will make even Ragnaros envious. - Jinxy Blastwheel

name: To Arms!
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Dual Wield.;Melee weapons you control have +5 ATK.;You pay 5 less to strike with Melee weapons.
flavour: Let's see just how resilient the elements really are. - Fraznak the Furious

name: The Firelord's Gift
rules: Ongoing: When this ability enters play, put a 2 [Fire] / 1 [Health] Fire Elemental ally token into play.;1, Destroy this ability -> Target ally has Ferocity this turn.

name: The Stonemother's Gift
rules: Ongoing: When this ability enters play, put a 2 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Earth Elemental ally token into play.;1, Destroy this ability -> Target ally has Protector this turn.

name: The Tidehunter's Gift
rules: Ongoing: When this ability enters play, put a 2 [Frost] / 1 [Health] Water Elemental ally token into play.;1, Destroy this ability -> Target ally has Elusive this turn.

name: The Windlord's Gift
rules: Ongoing: When this ability enters play, put a 2 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Air Elemental ally token into play.;1, Destroy this ability -> Target ally has Untargetable this turn.

name: Arvos Jadestone
rules: Mend 1(At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)
flavour: In Magni's name, we must do all we can to reclaim the land.

name: Axar
rules: Elusive(This ally can't be attacked.)
flavour: Outland burned under the foot of the Burning Legion; now Azeroth burns with the fury of the elements.

name: Brimi Tinkerblade
rules: On your turn: 3, Destroy this ally -> Destroy target equipment with cost 4 or less.
flavour: If it bends, it'll break.

name: Cadric Talworth
rules: Aberration (Prevent all non-combat damage that would be dealt to this ally.);Ferocity(This ally can attack immediately.)

name: Dagin Bootzap
rules: When this ally enters play, he deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Make the first shot count, laddie.

name: Dominic Kandor
rules: When this ally enters play, target ally has -2 ATK this turn.;Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

name: Elmira Moonsurge
rules: Elusive;At the start of your turn, this ally may deal 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally for each [Arcane] card you control.

name: Erama
flavour: The Light will protect us, even as we stand against the intense flames of the Firelord.

name: Gully Rustinax
rules: Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);Elusive(This ally can't be attacked.)

name: Jeniva Prescott
rules: When this ally enters play, she may heal 4 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: I may not be able to lift this curse, but that does not mean the Light has abandoned me.

name: Jerrick Valder
rules: When this ally attacks, you may exhaust target ally.;;Stash(As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Exhaust target ally.

name: Kane the Arcanist
rules: Untargetable;This ally has +1 / +1 for each card in your hand.
flavour: This curse has granted me newfound insight into the true meaning of power.

name: Nathar Wilderson
rules: Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);Aberration (Prevent all non-combat damage that would be dealt to this ally.)

name: Nessera Gildenrose
rules: 2 -> Another target ally has Assault 1 this turn. (It has +1 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: May Elune bless your blade and guide your strike.

name: Patricia Potter
flavour: I shall embrace the fire and harness its power to do my bidding!

name: Rufus Claybourne
rules: Aberration;When this ally enters play, target hero or ally has Aberration and becomes a Worgen this turn.
flavour: I will shred the flesh from Sylvanas's foul minions 'til nothing remains!

name: Shadowseer Calista
rules: When this ally enters play, target player puts an ally he controls into its owner's hand.;;Stash(As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn if face down.): Put an ally you control into its owner's hand.

name: Shaytha Lumenira
rules: This ally has Arcane Resistance while you control an ability. (Prevent all arcane ([Arcane]) damage that would be dealt to this ally.
flavour: Malfurion has returned from Emerald Dream to help guide us through these troubled times.

name: Stevrona Forgemender
rules: Token allies you control have +1/+1.;;Stash(As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Ready target token ally.

name: Tidus the Relentless
rules: Aberration, Ferocity;This ally has +1 ATK for each exhausted resource you control.
flavour: With Ysera's aid, we will drive Deathwing back into the foul hole he came from.

name: Vincent Brayden
rules: Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: I will not yield until every spark from the Firelord has been smothered.

name: Xeris
rules: Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);;Stash(As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Target ally has -1 ATK

name: Zooti Fizzlefury
rules: Elusive;When this ally enters play, put a 2 [Frost] / 1 [Health] Water Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: Me and 'Black Ice' have just the thing to put an end to the Firelord.

name: Burom Bladeseer
flavour: In my deepest meditations, I hear the faint voice of Thrall as he tries to keep all of Azeroth from breaking.

name: Caera Sunforge
rules: Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

name: Drax Felfuse
rules: Elusive(This ally can't be attacked.);When a Dragonkin enters play under your control, this ally has +2 ATK this turn.
flavour: The presence of the Dragon Queen lingers within my mind.

name: Hanu Skyhorn
rules: 3 -> Target ally has Arcane Resistance this turn. (Prevent all arcane ([Arcane]) damage that would be dealt to it.)
flavour: We will forever remember Cairne and all he did for our people.

name: Kark Baneblood
rules: When this ally enters play, you may destroy another ability, ally, or equipment you control. If you do, put target equipment on the bottom of its owner's deck.

name: Kizzli Grinderstub
rules: Time is Money(This ally may use [Exhaust] powers immediately.);[Exhaust] -> Target hero or ally has Stealth this turn. (It can't be protected against.)

name: Korlix Grimvik
rules: Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: One war ends, and another begins. The battle rages on.

name: Kuatha Mornhoof
rules: Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: May you bask in the light of the sun.

name: Lena Naville
rules: Mend 2 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 2 damage from target hero or ally.);;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn if face down.): Your hero heals 2 damage from target ally.

name: Maxie the Blaster
rules: Time is Money;[Exhaust] -> The next time target hero or ally you control would deal arcane damage this turn, it deals that much +2 instead.
flavour: Don't mind my. I'm just nerve for the forwards.

name: Nikka Blastbor
flavour: There is no shortage of prey for me here on these Lost Isles.

name: Rakzi the Earthgraced
rules: This ally has Assault 1 for each equipment you control.;;Stash: Target weapon you control has Assault 1 this turn.

name: Razo'jun
rules: Ferocity;When this ally enters play, put a 2 [Fire] / 1 [Health] Fire Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: Da first rule of da elements is to work wit dem, not force dem.

name: Rumu Moonhaze
rules: When this ally enters play, you may destroy another ability, ally, or equipment you control. If you do, destroy target ability.
flavour: May our ancestors unleash all vengeance on any Grimtotem that crosses my path.

name: Shaera Strikewing
rules: Stealth(This ally can't be protected against.);;Stash(As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn if face down.): Target ally has Stealth this turn.

name: Talaan Solaras
rules: Stash(As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn if face down.): Your hero deals 1 melee damage to target damaged ally.

name: Timriv the Enforcer
rules: Time is Money(This ally may use [Exhaust] powers immediately.);[Exhaust] -> Destroy all opposing damaged allies.
flavour: We goblins have a long history of exploiting weakness.

name: Tharuk Foulblade
rules: This ally has +3 ATK while attacking an exhausted hero or ally.
flavour: Keep the pressure on. The elements cannot be allowed to regroup and focus.

name: Tol'zin
rules: This ally has +2 / +2 for each token ally you control.;;Stash(As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Token allies you control have Assault 1 this turn.

name: Valytha Colton
flavour: The Dark Lady commands, and we obey.

name: Yoza'tsu
rules: When this ally enters play, target opposing ally has -1 [Health] this turn.

name: Zarvix the Tormentor
rules: Time is Money;[Exhaust] -> Target player puts the top card of his deck into his graveyard for each Goblin you control.
flavour: Misery loves company.

name: Zeni'vun
rules: 2, Discard a card -> This ally deals 1 arcane damage to each opposing hero or ally.

name: Azure Captain
rules: When you play an ability, target hero or ally has Protector this turn. (It may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: The former Blue Aspect, Malygos, was known as the Spell-Weaver.

name: Azure Drake
rules: When you play an ability, this ally heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: The blue dragonflight holds the Arcanomicon, the map of Azeroth's magical ley lines.

name: Azure Emissary
rules: When you play an ability, this ally deals 1 arcane damage to target hero for each Mage and Warlock you control.
flavour: Kalecgos and Tyrygosa have been attempting to protect their flight from Deathwing since the death of Malygos.

name: Azure Enforcer
rules: When you play an ability, this ally may deal 1 arcane damage to target ally.
flavour: The once great blue dragonflight was decimated by Deathwing during the War of the Ancients.

name: Azure Magus
rules: When you play an ability, target ally has Ferocity this turn. (It can attack immediately.)
flavour: The death of Malygos during the campaign against the Lich King has left a void in the leadership of the blue dragonflight.

name: Azure Skyrazor
rules: When you play an ability, heroes and allies you control have Assault 2 this turn. (They have +2 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: Malygos was empowered by the great titan Norgannon, and charged as the guardian of magic and hidden arcana.

name: Tyrygosa
rules: At the start of your turn, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an ability, you can play it immediately without paying its cost. (If it has X in its cost, X is 0.)
flavour: Deathwing has caused an unimaginable amount of pain and suffering to my flight, and must pay for his atrocities.

name: Bronze Drake
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control no ready resources, target hero or ally has Assault 1 this turn. (It has +1 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: Th Highfather Aman'Thul granted Nozdormu a portion of his power.

name: Bronze Drakonid
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control no ready resources, you may ready target ally.
flavour: Nozdormu and his bronze dragonflight were charged as the guardians of Azeroth's timelines.

name: Bronze Emissary
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control no ready resources, Rogues and Warriors you control have Assault 1 and Stealth this turn.
flavour: The bronze dragonflight must make sure that certain events happen a particular way, even if the outcome appears to be bad.

name: Bronze Guardian
rules: Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);When this ally enters play, if you control no ready resources, you may draw a card.

name: Bronze Skyrazor
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control no ready resources, it has Ferocity this turn.
flavour: Nozdormu's incredible power came with a curse, for he knows exactly when and how he will die.

name: Bronze Warden
rules: Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);When this ally enters play, if you control no ready resources, he may heal 3 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Soridormi
rules: 1 -> Target ally you control has Protector, Elusive, Stealth, or Untargetable this turn.
flavour: You step in and out of time as comfortably as any bronze dragon I've known.

name: Al'Akir the Windlord
rules: Air Elementals you control have Untargetable.;At the start of your turn, put a 2 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Air Elemental ally token into play.;Exhaust an Air Elemental you control -> Exhaust target ally.
flavour: Winds! Obey my command!

name: Bound Vortex
rules: Untargetable;When this ally exhausts, put a 2 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Air Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: Al'Akir has joined Deathwing in the search to uncover an ancient weapon in Uldum.

name: Bound Rumbler
rules: Protector;When this ally is destroyed, put a 2 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Earth Elemental ally token into play.

name: Therazane the Stonemother
rules: Earth Elementals you control have Protector.;At the start of your turn, put a 2 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Earth Elemental ally token into play.;Destroy an Earth Elemental you control -> Ready target hero or ally you control.
flavour: I'm tempted to crush you where you stand.

name: Bound Inferno
rules: Ferocity;When this ally is destroyed, put a 2 [Fire] / 1 [Health] Fire Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: Ferocious and ruthless, they are the ideal representation of all that Ragnaros embodies.

name: Ragnaros the Firelord
rules: Fire Elementals you control have Ferocity.;At the start of your turn, put a 2 [Fire] / 1 [Health] Fire Elemental ally token into play.;Destroy a Fire Elemental you control -> This ally deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: BY FIRE BE PURGED!

name: Bound Torrent
rules: Elusive;When this ally exhausts, put a 2 [Frost] / 1 [Health] Water Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: The naga are a threat to not only the mortal races of Azeroth, but also to Neptulon and his minions.

name: Neptulon the Tidehunter
rules: Water Elementals you control have Elusive.;At the start of your turn, put a 2 [Frost] / 1 [Health] Water Elemental ally token into play.;Exhaust a Water Elemental you control -> Your hero heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: My waters are cleansed! Drink in their power!

name: Landro's Lichling
rules: As the start of your turn, you may destroy this ally. If you do, target opponent chooses an ally he controls, and you gain control of it.
flavour: I WILL FREEZE THE BLOOD IN YOUR VEINS!

name: Malfurion Stormrage
rules: Protector, Stealth, Untargetable;At the start of your turn, you may put target ally with cost less than or equal to the number of resources you control from your graveyard into play.
flavour: We must succeed here if our world is going to survive at all.

name: Savage Raptor
rules: Ferocity;This ally has +1 ATK for each damage on it.

name: Champion's Deathdealer Breastplate
rules: Weapons you control have +1 ATK and an additional +1 ATK for each heirloom counter on this armor.;;Stash: Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Crown of Chelonian Freedom
rules: When this armor enters play, put X + 1 [DEF] counters on it, where X is the cost of a non-[Horde], non-[Alliance] ally you control.;This armor can prevent damage to non-[Horde], non-[Alliance] allies you control.
flavour: The War of the Elements is far bigger than either the Horde or the Alliance. - Sunwalker Nahano

name: God-Grinding Grips
rules: 4, Exhaust your hero -> Your hero deals 2 arcane damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Da reach of da Old Gods be much farda den before, mon. - Uzak'zim

name: Helm of Terrorizing Fangs
rules: When a non-[Horde], non-[Alliance] ally you control is destroyed, add a fang counter to this armor.;Remove a fang counter from this armor -> Target ally has Assault 1 this turn.

name: Leggings of the Vanquished Usurper
rules: 2, [Exhaust] -> Non-[Horde], non-[Alliance] allies you control have Assault 2 this turn. (They have +2 ATK on your turn.)

name: Polished Spaulders of Valor
rules: You pay 1 less to play equipment, add an additional 1 less for each heirloom counter on this armor, to a minimum of 1.;;Stash: Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Stained Shadowcraft Spaulders
rules: At the start of your turn, your hero may deal 1 nature damage to target hero or ally, plus an additional 1 for each heirloom counter on this armor.;;Stash: Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Tattered Dreadmist Robe
rules: If your hero would deal damage with an ability, it deals that much damage +1, and plus an additional 1 for each heirloom counter on this armor, instead.;;Stash: Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Wildlife Defender
rules: While you control a Dragonkin, your hero has Protector.;;Stash: Put target Dragonkin from your graveyard on top of your deck.

name: Darkmoon Card: Volcano
rules: At the start of your turn, you win the game if there are no card in your deck.;;Stash: Target player puts the top two cards of his deck into his graveyard.

name: Landro's Hitching Post
rules: You can control any number of mounts.

name: Axe of Grounded Flame
rules: This weapon enters play with three +1 ATK counters.;On you turn: Remove a +1 ATK counter from this weapon -> Target ally has Arcane , Fire, or Nature Resistance this turn.

name: Barnacle-Coated Greataxe
rules: You pay 1 less to play this weapon for each equipment you control.;This weapon has +1 ATK for each equipment you control.
flavour: Imbued with the power of the oceans, it's just the thing to put Ragnaros in his place. - Aric Stonejack

name: Blacksoul Polearm
rules: You can't strike with this weapon on your turn.

name: Crusher of Bonds
flavour: I'm going to liberate your mind the messy way. - Fraznak the Furious

name: Fire-Etched Dagger
rules: When this weapon enters play, you may put target Dragonkin ally from your graveyard into your hand.;2, Exhaust you hero -> Your hero deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally for each Dragonkin you control.

name: Glyphtrace Ritual Knife
rules: At the start of your turn, you may pay 4 and destroy this weapon. If you do, destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment.
flavour: Memorize the glyph... Enter the Firelands. - Tortolla

name: Kickback 5000
rules: Long-Range;This weapon enters play with two +1 ATK counters.;When your hero deals combat damage with this weapon, remove all +1 ATK counters from this weapon.;4 -> Add two +1 ATK counters to this weapon.

name: Lightningflash
rules: Long-Range(When you strike with this weapon on your turn, defenders deals no combat damage to the attacker.);Ranged Dual Wield (You can control a second Ranged weapon. You can strike with a second Ranged weapon during the same combat.)

name: Lordbane Scepter
rules: When you play an ability, this weapon has +2 ATK this turn.
flavour: It channels my power as if it were an extension of myself. - Olivia Damescas

name: Poisonfire Greatsword
rules: Exhaust an ally you control -> This weapon has +2 ATK this turn.
flavour: The wounds it leaves burn with otherworldly pain.

name: The Perforator
rules: This weapon has +X ATK, where X is the highest cost among Dragonkin allies you control.
flavour: Only the most talented jewelcrafters can produce such fine workmanship. - Tazrik Crankust

name: Wild Hammer
rules: Fury Talent You can't put Arms Talents or Protection Talents in your deck.);Your hero had Two-Handed Dual Wield;While you control no ready resources, you pay 7 less to strike with Two-Handed weapons.

name: Aessina's Miracle
rules: If a hero or ally you controlled dealt arcane ([Arcane]) damage this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: I promise you, the wilderness spirit will be silent no longer. New life will bloom from the ashes of old. - Nordu

name: All That Rises
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Shuffle all allies from your graveyard into your deck.
flavour: ENTER... THE TEMPLE AND... DESTROY... HALLAZEAL THE ASCENDED! - L'ghorek

name: A Bird In Hand
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an ally, put it into your hand.
flavour: The Harpies communicate across the ridge using a series of signal fires. If we extinguish one, Marion is sure to come investigate. - Thisalee Crow

name: Breaking the Bonds
rules: You pay 1 less to complete this quest for each ally you control.;Pay 7 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Shadows lurk in the rods of fire beside me. Slay them, that I may be free again. - Tortolla

name: Defending the Rift
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an ability, put it into your hand.
flavour: We cannot stand idly by while the naga threaten Neptulon's realm. - Erunak Stonespeaker

name: Dragon, Unchained
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed Dragonkin into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: Lirastrasza is the last and greatest of the red dragons that the Twilight's Hammer captured. - Garona Halforcen

name: Elemental Energy
rules: Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if you control an Elemental.
flavour: As shaman we can tap directly into the energies of the elementals that inhabit Deepholm and use them to heal the damage that the rift is causing. - Seer Kormo

name: End of the Supply Line
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed [Arcane] card into your hand and the ret on the bottom of your deck. (An [Arcane] card is a card [Arcane] in its lower-left corner.)
flavour: The chaos we sow back here will be felt up and down the chain of command. - Jadi Falaryn

name: Entrenched
rules: If you control an ally: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Champion Decks
flavour: Diamant says you are to be trusted. Diamant is patient and wise, so I shall allow you to prove yourself. - Kor the Immovable

name: Forged of Shadow and Flame
rules: If you control an equipment: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: The weapons the Twilight's Hammer uses against us are crafted by Forgemaster Pyrenduis within these very halls. - Jordan Olafson

name: A Head Full of Wind
rules: On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a 2 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Air Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: Take one of my wind-devils with you and get me a sample from those clouds. - Windspeaker Lorvarius

name: Lightning in a Bottle
rules: If you control an ability: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: I saw you striding across the Lightning Ledge, with lightning bolts in your hand. - Ian Duran

name: Putting the Pieces Together
rules: On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a 2 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Earth Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: It should not take much prompting to rebind them to service against the flayers. - Berracite

name: Sea Legs
rules: On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a 2 [Frost] / 1 [Health] Water Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: With this, you should find maneuvering in the sea to be nearly effortless. - Erunak Stonespeaker

name: Something That Burns
rules: On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a 2 [Fire] / 1 [Health] Fire Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: I'm all out of gunpowder, but I thinkm I know what we can use instead... the heart of my fire elemental. - Initiate Goldmine

name: Abyssal Maw
rules: On your turn, if a hero or ally you controlled dealt frost ([Frost]) damage this turn: 2, [Exhaust] -> Put a 2 [Frost] / 1 [Health] Water Elemental ally token into play.;When a Water Elemental enters play under your control, your hero may heal 2 damage from itself.

name: Deepholm
rules: On your turn, if a hero or ally you controlled dealt melee ([Melee]) damage this turn: 2, [Exhaust] -> Put a 2 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Earth Elemental ally token into play.;When a Earth Elemental enters play under your control, target ally has Assault 1 this turn.

name: Firelands
rules: On your turn, if a hero or ally you controlled dealt fire ([Fire]) damage this turn: 2, [Exhaust] -> Put a 2 [Fire] / 1 [Health] Fire Elemental ally token into play.;When a Fire Elemental enters play under your control, remove the top two cards of target player's deck from the game.

name: Skywall
rules: On your turn, if a hero or ally you controlled dealt nature ([Nature]) damage this turn: 2, [Exhaust] -> Put a 2 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Air Elemental ally token into play.;When an Air Elemental enters play under your control, you may exhaust target ally

name: Savage Raptor
rules: Ferocity;This ally has +1 ATK for each damage on it.

name: Landro's Lichling
rules: As the start of your turn, you may destroy this ally. If you do, target opponent chooses an ally he controls, and you gain control of it.
flavour: I WILL FREEZE THE BLOOD IN YOUR VEINS!

name: War Party Hitching Post
rules: You can control any number of mounts.
